name: Mens Bracelet, Silver Black Arrows Bangle, Geometric Modern & Athletic
description:
A modern bangle for cool guys with black arrow design atop a nickel steel background. This abstract geometric bangle is a modern version of a friendship bracelet made with men in mind. A timeless classic, this bangle can be worn by both men and women (the kind of women that tend to borrow their men's shirts and belts). The bracelet is woven from tiny Japanese seed beads in two colors (black and nickel) and has a pleasant smooth texture to it. It is about 3/4" (1cm) wide and has a circumference of 8 1/2" (22cm). The bracelet is finished off with a lobster clasp closure and other components in gunmental (black) finish. This is a standard men's size and will fit most average mens wrist. 

Size adjustments for unusually small of large wrists can be made upon request at no additional cost. The last photo features a similar bracelet with a different design option, also available in the shop in the men's section.

For more beaded adornments, please check out the shop JPJbeaded.com

~ All of the pieces are created one bead at a time with high quality beads and thread, to last you a lifetime.

~ This piece comes lovingly gift wrapped in a jewelry box. If you wish to purchase this for someone else, it can be sent to the gift recipient directly with a note written on your behalf.

name: Metallic Mens Bangle, Gray Black Hematite Bracelet, Bead Woven Bracelet

This minimalist beaded bracelet is a modern version of a friendship bracelet made with men in mind. A timeless classic, this bangle can be worn by both men and women (the kind of women that tend to borrow their men's shirts and belts). It is about 3/4" (1cm) wide and has a circumference of 8 1/2" (22cm). The bracelet is finished off with a lobster clasp closure and other components in gunmental (black) finish. This is a standard men's size and will fit most average mens wrist.
